text: I really enjoy the experience Blaze pizza has to offer. The customizable pizza is fantastic too! There's a lot of different options for people who might not be able to eat a regular ol' za

name: Erik Kisner
text: Blaze Pizza gives you great customization options for your pizza and you get served very quickly.  The service is normally good but never great.  I always feel like they rush you through the line.  The restaurant is very clean and has an ‚Ä¶More

name: Adonnis Goldstein
text: Blaze has excellent pizza in my opinion. It's almost as good as Ledo's. The people are very friendly and service was excellent. Much better than Pizza Hut or Dominio's. If you get an opportunity to go there, I highly suggest you do. You won't be disappointed.

name: philip montgomery
text:
This place is strange. Only one size pizza - 11 inches.
Their product is tasty but the Chipotle/Subway order system just feels weird when you're ordeeing a pizza.

name: anthony tucker
text: Panda Express I my favorite restaurant, Blaze Pizza is right next door. Family made me go to Blaze. I was not disappointed. Best pizza I've eaten in years! They had great lemonade too! 5/5 would go again!

name: Marle Davis
text: Every time we go the food and fountain drinks are delicious!  We have 3 teenagers (one is vegan) and the hubby doesn't eat pork.  Everyone always finds something they love and are actually stuffed!

name: Matt Stockslager
text: Had the green stripe pizza, very, very good. My wife and I were able to split one but could have eaten the whole thing. Love the ability to customize. Reasonable prices, good variety. Simple pie option for picky kids or people who just want a plain pizza. Friendly and helpful staff. Will definitely visit again.

name: Chris Fitzgerald
text: Was our first time here. Great Pizza and Great Service. The crust is super thin, and Cooked in a Fire Brick oven, and is Simply Delicious!! The Black Cherry Soda is Delicious as well!! Would Definitely go back!!

name: Shanon Withers
text: Neat pizza chain.  Service was good.  Didn't care for the crust I ordered.

name: Richard Lunsford
text: Trish is the best. She replaced both of my large meat eaters pizzas. Had a mix up on the curbside pick up last night but Trish replaced the pizzas today and was wonderful. Hats off to Trish the manager there!!

name: Mike Grunewald
text: Build your own pie without putting your hands in the dough and arms in the oven..... (a nod to Kosmo Kramer). Absolutely fantastic brick oven fired pizza, though a little on the pricey side.

name: Taylor Combs
text: This is my favorite spot to take my 4-year-old. We split a pizza and I get a salad-- perfect amount of food. The staff here is wonderful. Multiple times they have seen us and asked if I want her half cut into smaller pieces. I really appreciate that level of customer service. Their rewards program is pretty great as well.

name: Shane Yarrington
text: Great atmosphere, great fresh pizza. Good for a quick lunch !

name: Madaca 99
text: This is the 4th Blaze I've been to. Florida, Virginia, and now here in WV. The value is outstanding! Make your own for 8.55 is the way to go. I usually get up to 6 toppings and I never get a sideways glance. It's always "is that enough? You ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Lopez
text: The family and I shared 3 pizzas and an order of garlic knots. The pizzas were just a little too big for one for each of us. We enjoyed a White Top, a Simple Pie, and a pick 2 topping with pepperoni and bacon. All of the pieces were come ‚Ä¶More

name: Mahmethan Shadid

text: Good service and great food, and Friendly employees!

name: William Walthers
text: Great place to get a üçï

text: 1st time at Blaze pizza and I wont be back. It's a neat concept of watching them make it. But that's it. It was a lackluster pizza to say the least. We ordered the meat lovers one, I'm not sure the actual name but you can see the photo it's ‚Ä¶More

name: Susan Chadwick
text: So take out was the plan tonight and we picked Blaze unanimously. Ordered 3 pizzas and 3 dessert treats. Even with the 20 minute drive home the pizzas were still hot and almost exactly as ordered. One was missing the BBQ drizzle. Can't beat the oven baked taste. Still my favorite place to eat pizza üòã

name: Spartan 351
text: Wow!! Amazing place! We came in just in time to beat rush hour and it was totally worth it! Reasonable price, quality food, friendly and professional staff! ‚Ä¶More

name: harvey dickerson
text: Loved it, it's like chipotle but with pizza. It's very delicious

text: I love the pizza, and the steps they were taking to make customers feel safe during the pandemic were great!

name: Cheryl Everson

text: Excellent pizza, decent size pies as long as your not starving but it my go to place now for pizza. Its next to kings pizza tho in terms of deliciousness mmmmm

text: Place has a cool vibe to it and the staff was friendly. Pizza was good but I messed up in accepting the sea salt on top, couple bites were too salty. Overall I would go back; prices were good, pizza was pretty good and the liquados were a tasty alternative to soda.

name: Luis Campudoni

name: Susie Coleman

text: Pretty neat place. Imagine Chipotle, but for pizza. They are a bit big for a single person, perfect for 2. Unless you're really hungry, these pizzas are great for leftovers.

name: John Huynh
text: Excellent pizza. Was well worth the price. Can't go wromg with your own personal custom pizza. Pizza was delicious. Will recommend and will go to any Blaze pizza while traveling.

name: LEGO ladz
text: It made me laugh cause Google review says tell others why you Love this place. Well...the flavor is Amazing! Staff...Amazing! Ingredients...Amazing! Fresh! Get down to Blaze eat some pizza the way you want it made. If you are craving pizza you will not be disappointed.

text: Food was good service is not been here for 30 minutes not busy no one has attempted to clean a table

name: Myranda Hill
text: I‚Äôve definitely had better pizza, I didn‚Äôt care for the crust it was very bland and very thin. I would say aspect an average pizza. It‚Äôs not the worst either. What makes this place stand out as far as pizza joints, is the ‚Äúchipotle set‚Äù up ‚Ä¶More

text: Had the cauliflower crust pizza. Very tasty.

name: Rick Hilaman
text: Great pizza for the cost.

name: Benardo
text: The pizza here is solid. Prices are reasonable and the pizza comes out quickly and efficiently. The employees are nice and it makes a great place to eat with friends!

name: Benjamin Scott
text: Great pie! I enjoyed the "veg out". Place could use a lil attention in the eating area and bathroom... alotta dirty tables. Over all employess were clean and kind. Thanks!

text: Nice place..a bit skimpy on the toppings unless you ask for more. Staff isn't all that personable kind of straight to the point kind of people. Pizza on the other hand is outstanding!!

name: jenise bro
text: It's great. Really like this little spot. Pizza built my way in front of me and cooked quickly. I love coming up with new ways to make my new favorite pizza. Lots of staff, I mean lots so it moved quickly. I think it's priced fair and we just really enjoyed it

name: Craig Ashenfelter
text: First time ....  Staff was friendly and helpful. Under 13 bucks for a pizza and drinks for me and my wife. Good value.

name: Anon Mouse
text: Great vibe, fast service, and self serve drinks. Great place for a first date or lunch if you're close. I recommend the Build Your Own or Take Two.

You get to watch them make the crust too.
The crust reminds me of the pizza I had in Italy.

name: Ronnie Hopkins
text: My first visit to a Blaze pizza, what a great concept!! What ever toppings you want without costing a fortune.

Delicious and way more filling than i thought it would be lol.

name: CrystalNin
text: A great pizza place! It's like Subway except for pizza! All the pizzas are cooked fresh after you finish building it. Has a good rewards system which can earn you free drinks, desserts, or pizzas.

name: Terry Shaw
text: We always enjoy Blaze Pizza - nice vegan options and delicious toppings.  This is by far my favorite Blaze however.  Clean, well staffed, great veg options (loved the butternut squash), and generous toppings.

name: sheri baby
text: It is nice. Great price fast service. Fruit drinks were weak and watery.  Place was busy. Service good. Drink station was sticky and messy. Didn't visit the restroom so can't comment on that. Rest of the place was clean and neat. Pizza was good. Liked the thinner dough.

name: Lauren Cloud
text: Quality has gone down but still appericate the dairy free(vegan cheese) option so I continue to come

name: Linda Blandford

text: I had the option of building a keto pizza. It was amazing. It was pricey. Keto crust is $3 extra for a pie. Small salad was $6. Good food but too expensive for what you get. Spent $32 for 2 pies, 1 salad and 1 drink.

name: Ivona Carberg

text: Employees seem to be down all the time. Nobody smiles. Food is good though.

name: Scott
text: Decent pizza, nice staff, cold beer.  Less heavy dressing on the salads would earn an extra star. Worth a visit.

name: James Newcomb
text: This is a great place to go if you want pizza and don't have a lot of time. The only drawback is that the pizza is personal size, not great for sharing. Although I think they offer a larger pizza online or app.only

name: Jackie Richards
text:
Love the pizza, price was great,
two of us ate for $13. it was very clean except in the ladies bathroom. Hope they work on that.

name: C Seckman
text: Fast friendly service, the food is good and they have different drinks that no other local place has. It's a great experience all around.

text: Really yummy for $$8.95 10" pizza

text: Excellent customer service. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Excellent pizza with a great variety of toppings.

name: Jonathan Atlas
text: Great service and clean establishment. The pizza was made fast and was very good. They take pride in how your pie looks, all toppings were evenly distributed and very tasty. Different but good drink selection, they also serve beer! They have high and low sitting tables. Parking was easy and convenient. Will definitely go back!

name: Connie Sines

text: Super fast. Great pizza. No extra cost for toppings. Efficient setup. Nice atmosphere. Family friendly and decent priced. Not somewhere to go if you are indecisive because the line moves fast and decisions cant be thought about.

text: Yum! Great pizza and pricess aren't bad! Think Chipotle for pizza lovers. Crust is thin and toppings are generous but well portioned. They have some non-tomato sauces if you are allergic or just don't want red sauce. We got the simple, BBQ ‚Ä¶More
